recipe.title: Buffalo Bread
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup dates -- shredded 3/4 teaspoon baking soda 1 cup boiling water 1 egg -- beaten 1/2 cup maple syrup 1 teaspoon salt 1 cup flour 1 cup whole wheat flour 1 teaspoon baking powder 1/2 cup nuts -- chopped
recipe.steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Mix together the dates, baking soda and boiling water. Add the egg and syrup and mix well. Beat in remaining ingredients. Pour into a greased bread pan and bake for one hour or until done; cool. Slice into 12 pieces.
